review: I have to say, the game for what it is, is absolutely amazing, the gameplay is varied, and the new gravity gun truly mixes things up.However.It is painfully short.But then again, ITS FREE, so no reason not to check it out if you have an hour or two!
I will grow old and look back at my past and will remember this game. I will remember how it changed me as a person and how it was my childhood. 100000000/10

This game about a year ago was average at best. But now...This game achieves survival like no other. I honestly can't be bothered writing a review because I just want to get straight back to it!Bassically, buy the game.
If you can tell me a good reason why they won't make a third game, I will let you join the illuminati.
Look I loved all the other games but this is just getting a bit ridiculous. You have call of duty beat scott.
A great innovative puzzler that anyone will most certainly love!
